message.empty: Š_Are you sure you want to delete this folder, ${title}_________________________________________________č?
message.mustBeEmpty: Š_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted___________________________________________________č.
message.aFewCannotBeDeleted: Š_A few items cannot be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting the rest_____________________________________________č?
message.mustBeEmptyProceed: Š_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting these items_________________________________________________________________________________č?
message.cannotBeDeleted: Š_The folder ${title} cannot be deleted because its items cannot be deleted___________________________________________________________č.
